website_summaries.verdict: A modest in-ground pool cover that covers the basics and has a reasonable price.
pros: Multiple seams to prevent excessive wear and tear
Simple to install and easy to remove
cons: Needs more overlap to ensure a proper fit on your pool

customer_reviews.title: The latch tool stick makes assembly and breakdown super easy. It even came with extra plugs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Other companies priced a cover similar for upwards of $1200. We needed one asap, as our pool is damaged and repairs won't be available until cooler weather. My husband installed this in about 1 hour himself. We've had it for almost 6 months now, and have had no issues. The latch tool stick makes assembly and breakdown super easy. It even came with extra plugs and parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winterizing cover
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 18x38. Everything arrived quickly and correctly. You need a 3/4 concrete drill bit, recommend buying 2 or more bits, depending on how hard/old your concrete is! Also a slightly wider concrete bit is recommended to flair tops of holes to countersink flush the anchors. A hammer drill is a must and 3+ hours of work. Unless you have help! I used a little marine grade calk adhesive in each hole and silicone spray on screw threads. Extremely happy with results! Can’t rate durability since it hasn’t lived through a Michigan winter yet! If you’re somewhat handy, this is definitely a do it yourself project worth the savings of 3rd party installers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected. The contents were as expected and the quality of the cover itself appears very durable. You must remember to order cording to your pool size and not the cover size because the cover is actually larger to cover the pool. Also, all hardware, tools, and instructions were provided. I highly recommend using a hammer drill with three-quarter inch concrete bit when installing the anchors. Otherwise, it would take all day To drill through hard concrete or stone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sengstacke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Just as good and half the price as what my local pool store had. Installation was easy, but took a few hours including time to recharge a cordless drill. All hardware was included and good quality. Only tools needed are 3/4" concrete drill (spent $10 for a drill bit at local hardware), tape measure and a hammer. I also used a roll of masking tape to layout lines for where to drill.
customer_reviews.author: Shadetree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a great replacement for the much more expensive brands. The straps were placed the same distance and included all hardware for installation including the tool to stretch the straps over the anchors.
customer_reviews.author: david sauer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a strong pool liner that would last and was more safe than any flimsy old liner. This met all expectations! Easy to install just byfollowing directions (had to rent a professional hammer drill for $25 from rental in town) Strongly recommend! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ryanandcara

customer_reviews.title: Includes all hardware, springs. Only need a drill for concrete to DIY Install
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to self install with 2 people. It included all hardware and straps. Seems to be very good quality for the price. We still need to adjust straps tighter as some sag is expected at first with some slight stretching of the straps. Once all hardware and straps were in place cover can go on and off in under 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Danyell

customer_reviews.title: 2 person job
customer_reviews.text: I was affraid of wasting my money, trying to go on the cheap side, but it does what is supposed to do, its easy to install with the pipe tool and if you create a system like i did to remove it you will never have trouble putting it or taking it, what we did is that we took one end off (1 section) folded on top, remove second strap (2nd section) folded and so on, very easy
customer_reviews.author: X3MR8SR

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality item. To make matters worse, item came out of the shipping box with a quarter sized hole in it. After attempts to return under warranty have been repeatedly refused.
customer_reviews.author: JMA68

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Made it through the first winter with this cover. I've had a pool for about 30 years, this was the easiest pool opening ever. No struggling with water on the pool cover. Also the water was the cleanest I have ever seen in the spring. The cover still looks brand new. Very happy with it. My only complaint is that there should have been and option for the anchors. I had to buy the wood anchors for my deck separately, and have a bunch of concrete ones that will never get used.
customer_reviews.author: Lou S.

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy pool cover.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 18x36 mesh pool cover and wanted something that was durable. The cover fit the the description and was also 2 feet wider than what was described on the description. So, you will receive a 20x38' cover, just for reference. The mesh is also nice since it lets light in preventing algae buildup.
customer_reviews.author: nikboom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Pool Cover
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase. This is a high quality Pool Cover and all the necessary pieces and parts were included. The cover took a few hours to install. I recommend using a 1/4 inch pilot hole first when drilling the concrete slab and work out from the centers as the instructions say. I also recommend measuring the distances between straps before drilling the next respective hole to ensure spacing is correct.
customer_reviews.author: survivor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, I should have invested in this alot sooner. 20x40 cover has several inches of overhang to ensure perfect fit and installation. Came with all the hardware except drill bit. Hardest part was drilling the anchor holes in my concrete. Used silicone spray to coat anchors so they don't give me trouble in the spring. Had 4 ppl to help spread it out and hold it while we did corner anchors. Kinda tricky working around the sliding board support legs but we made it work. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Gee

customer_reviews.title: The peace of mind is well worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described and fit our 16x32 ft inground pool perfectly! With the proper tools it was easy to install; my husband completed it on his own in less than a day. Our 50 lb dog has already walked over it twice and it barely sank down. WELL worth the peace of mind with pets and kids in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: BOC

customer_reviews.title: ... imitation loop locks and that they are not very good. He said this one is every bit as ...
customer_reviews.text: My pool guy said there's a few imitation loop locks and that they are not very good. He said this one is every bit as good as the loop locks and even comes with an oversized bag that you would have to pay for from loop lock
customer_reviews.author: M f

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on this Pool Cover, but watch the size.
customer_reviews.text: This pool cover replaced my old one which came with the house's pool over 11 years ago. Unfortunately, I probably bought it a little too large. My pool is actually 14' wide, so I had to drill new holes in my pool deck concrete to make it fit tight. It works perfectly now.
customer_reviews.author: rbdeli

customer_reviews.title: super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: this is out first season of use so I may change my review down the line, but so far -we are super happy with this purchase. It took my husband about 4 hours to install it and he was taking breaks in between drilling holes in the concrete. It's standing up to the ice and snow at this point and we feel much safer letting our dogs out in the back yard now. This saved us about $1500 by doing it ourselves rather than having our pool maintenance company install it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz R.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product however parts were missing such as 2 of the springs to lock and hold it into place seems like cheapish vinyl material but I guess you get what you pay for this will be our first season using it so it better hold up the winter weather. I will be doing a follow up review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Borges

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t even close to what I ordered, no hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t even close to what I ordered, no hardware, not mesh, vinyl and plastic, no instructions, I have had a lot of success with warehouse deals and probably will order again, not sure what went wrong this time.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: Just put the cover on today, took about 2 hrs or so and this was by myself, really need 2 people to spread cover over the pool. Cover looks great and seems really well made. Anchor bolts work just like I expected with no trouble. Only problem was I couldn't find the tool to pull the springs on the anchor bolts. Don't think I misplaced it I really think it wasn't in the package but I improvised using a 3/8 extension and socket with no issues. Would definitely buy this cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley  B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Safety Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This pool cover is so awesome that it glows in the dark! Safe for people with children or animals, I feel secure knowing that this is the cover that we chose!
customer_reviews.author: Madcat Magick

customer_reviews.title: Used on our above ground pool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and ease of installing this cover on our above ground pool!! I have gone through so many above ground pool winter covers over the years...our winters in Northern Pa are rough on covers. Obviously we didn't use the concrete bolts....we secured it with rope and tied it to the decking of our Kayak pool. Honestly...it was super easy...no hubby/wife battles messing with wires...water bags or jugs to hold it down! ts mesh so it should be easy to take off in the spring. My only regret is not buying this 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad to install
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad to install. Has held some snow this season and done wonderfully. So far so good after 1/2 a season
customer_reviews.author: uspsuperman

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great, but use the right size drill.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new pool owner and the previous owner had covered the pool with a tarp and secured it with salt bags. It was like this when we moved in. This is a huge improvement. If you plan to install it in preexisting cement do two things: use a half inch drill and shorter drill bit. The drilling is the singular challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Our pool in not screened in and my husband would constantly complain about the leaves that fall every day in the pool. With this cover, we keep it closed and open it when we go in. He is going to invest in a roller to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT  PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheap cover 3 yrs ago. So sorry. This cover, you can't beat it. Heavy duty. Installed by 1. I have an 18x36 pool and bought 20x40 cvr. Pool co here wanted $3000+.. I don't think they could've done any any better. I'M VERY SATISFIED & HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Product Size Not Clearly Represented
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY! Product size is not accurately represented! Seller will not rufund what you paid if you need to return it!
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The cover has only been on for a few weeks but so far I love it. The instructions were next to useless so plan on spending some time on YouTube to install it, but once it’s on it seems very well made and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: M. northup

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Installation is straight forward.
customer_reviews.text: Installation with two of us took anout 1 1/2 hours. The tool to place the springs work like a charm. You will need a 3/4 inch mason bit to install the anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know which side goes up.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, simple to install. Stainless and brass hardware for corrosion protection and long life. Instructions are a little vague but easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: punctures after 2 years, hard to get warranty coverage
customer_reviews.text: purchased 16x32 for my inground, showed 2 punctures in year 2. Emailed back and forth with customer service. After providing all evidences, no more responses from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Teng Lin

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I had a pool company come to install the cover and they were skeptical since I didn't get it from them. They were pleasantly surprised. New anchors installed and cover stretched nicely. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Welch-Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Best pool cover ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I got this 14 years ago. Replaced an electric sliding pool cover, which was always a pain. The Blue Wave has held up with heavy rain, snow and ice. Amen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far great product. Easy to install first time takes awhile
customer_reviews.text: First month. So far great product. Easy to install first time takes awhile. Because you have to drill the holes. Use a hammer drill!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Too early to comment on durability. Although it seems to be a very good material.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Size in description is incorrect for 20x40
customer_reviews.text: The size in the description for a 20x40 cover says 25x45 but when it arrived it was only 22x42 so we had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mcdevitt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We had our pool closer install for us. She said we were very lucky to have purchased this cover for the price we did. GLI is the only cover/liners they use. She said she would not have been able to purchase this for us at this price, and it would have been easily double. Looks great! Registered the warranty too!
customer_reviews.author: Turtlecat

customer_reviews.title: said it was good quality. all parts came in box
customer_reviews.text: my pool guys installed it without a problem. said it was good quality. all parts came in box. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: leslie331

customer_reviews.title: Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit at all. Got the wrong one as mine was supposed to have steps area. Amazon let me return it no problem though
customer_reviews.author: QueenEh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but was sent an oversized cover. My installers made it work, but it is awkward. Yes, I would buy again, but would open and verify size before having it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gisel

customer_reviews.title: Exellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, was delivered on time, I recommend the product and this company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This cover seems durable and well made. The fit was perfect, with a foot over on each side. This was replacing an old cover, so the anchor system was already installed in our cement. The straps fit perfectly on our anchors. The price was a good value compared to the pool store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product!! Easy to install, we should have done this 10 years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: gus gallas

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my old pool cover...checked prices at my area pool supply places and they were $1000.00 and up got this one for half the price...very high quality cover easy instructions...highly reccomend this pool cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m only assuming it’s fine. I won’t be using it til the end of season to close the pool!
customer_reviews.author: bus mom

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Holds Snow Weight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install - we have a deck made of trex decking material - around an above ground pool that is 2/3 the way into the ground. The install went fast and the pool cover is holding up even with hundreds and hundreds of pounds of wet snow and ice on it. We couldn’t be happier so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve's Outdoor Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Decent for its price!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with how it turned out! Made of durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: Rami Farag

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Let's see how it holds up after a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: DHolloway

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and use.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. If you rent a 1/2 inch bit and impact drill, this job is a breeze. Each hole only took only 30 to 45 sec to drill and you have to drill about 30 + of them. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Warren J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how you get this same quality product from amazon but for half the price! I Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Install was pretty easy. We’ll see how it looks by the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of the mesh. Install was pretty easy. We’ll see how it looks by the end of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: StraightTalk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed thousands of top brand covers and got this one on a budget, think I’m switching to this brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality product with exact dimensions and no quess work for installation great price
customer_reviews.author: Marshall LaCasse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was actually easy to install and it works great. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! Size is NOT advertised correctly!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered first time. Too small. Wrong size advertised. Sent back and reordered. Too big. Wrong size advertised. Now, I have to pay the pool guy to re-drill anchors. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Brandt

customer_reviews.title: In ground safety cover.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good quality. Unfortunately it was the wrong size fir our pool. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a correct size. Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t a 20x40 cover. I made it work but it’s not installed properly. And several spring hooks were missing. Luckily I had extras from the past covers I installed.
customer_reviews.author: randolph

customer_reviews.title: Pool cover for Inground pool
customer_reviews.text: Used it to my cover my inground pool and it is wonderful. Perfect size and the tool and parts are excellent that came with it. Price was fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Saphira

customer_reviews.title: Includes a very accurate drilling template
customer_reviews.text: This pool cover was a great value. I (foolishly?) drilled all holes (prior to laying out the cover) based on included cover template measurements and a little Youtube research. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LorlaJo

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price but material is easily damaged.
customer_reviews.author: L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Easy to install. Can't speak to how it long it will hold up, hence the four star durability rating.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Time will Tell
customer_reviews.text: Just installed today only time will tell how durable it is East installation process. So for so good !
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than measurements asked for.
customer_reviews.text: You sent it too big. Its 2ft bigger. Not able to anchor it properly. Reached out to customer service to return for correct one. No response.
customer_reviews.author: Ivydunn

customer_reviews.title: Price was great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Best price I found. Had to drill holes in concrete to install. Three sons made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: It came 18x30. You don’t find out until you open it up on the pool.
customer_reviews.author: M Clem

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable pool cover that fits exactly as stated when it comes to the dimension.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin paxton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pool cover that we have ever owned! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clark

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice
customer_reviews.text: I little more work that I was expecting but I am very happy with the results. A hammer drill makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover. Just as good as the ones you paid 12 and $1,400 for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Used for inground pool cover. Looks good, but a little thin. overall pleased, all tools were included.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis love

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover and easy to install. I substituted wood anchors for my deck and they worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven  A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Easy to install and fit great with our pool!
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Cook

customer_reviews.title: They claim this cover is sturdy enough to support 600 lbs with it not sagging ...
customer_reviews.text: They claim this cover is sturdy enough to support 600 lbs with it not sagging yet a 180 lb adult couldn’t walk across it without getting more than their feet wet. Sure it keeps leaves out but that’s it. It was not a quick and easy set up either. Took hrs and 2 adults to install.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to write this review because I wanted to see how it handled the heavy snow. I'm very pleased. Great price. Looks great and has held up to the elements so far. Note: they initially sent me the wrong size which was a drag because I didn't figure it out until I was trying to install, but they corrected the problem by sending me the right size very quickly so no hard feelings. I wish I would have bought a safety cover years ago, but they were too expensive. This is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loop Loc safety pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Full cover performed as expected even though it was used it was still in perfect
customer_reviews.author: M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Winter pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Had to drill new holes for installation so I went through a bunch of drill bits, but when done it was fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lienau

customer_reviews.title: The cover seems fine. It came with all the right hardware -quickly
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems fine. It came with all the right hardware -quickly. I have not had it long enough to see how it weathers.
customer_reviews.author: John E Lehman

customer_reviews.title: ... old cover and not have to drill new anchors good luck. I was able to match the anchors ...
customer_reviews.text: Accurate description of cover fits 18x36 pool rectangular if your trying to retrofit from an old cover and not have to drill new anchors good luck. I was able to match the anchors on the length of this one not on the width I was only able to hit three of them.....otherwise good cover so far
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Meko

product_meta.title: Blue Wave 18-ft x 36-ft Rectangular In Ground Pool Safety Cover - Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Blue| Size:Pool Size: 18 by 36-FeetGuard your children & pets as you protect your pool. Durable, long-lasting Dirt Defender covers are strong enough to support your entire family, yet light enough to put on or remove from your pool in five minutes or less. These premium covers are made of super-strong two-ply mesh with a break strength of over 4,000 lbs. During use, the cover is held in place with brass anchors that recess flush with your pool deck when the cover is not in use. Rest assured that your children and pets are protected from accidental drowning. In addition to its safety features, Dirt Defender safety covers afford excellent winter protection for your pool. Its fine, lightweight mesh allows rain to seep through but screens out leaves and debris. Spring clean up is a snap because no water collects on the cover. The cover comes complete with brass anchors, stainless-steel springs, installation tool and storage bag. Backed by a 12-Year Warranty.
feature_bullets: Select cover based on your pool size. Actual cover measures approximately 2-ft wider and 2-ft longer
Comes complete with all hardware to install on concrete decking
Includes: brass anchors, stainless-steel springs, buckles, installation tools, and storage bag
Drill and tamp style brass anchoring system permanently secures anchors in concrete
Multi-seamed stitching ensures safety and prevents wear and tear
Stainless steel hardware resists damage from the elements
High scrim mesh panel design lets water though but protects pool against dirt and debris
Reinforced wear strips on underside of cover to guard against cover abrasion and fraying

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars181 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
